actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that income otherwise eligible to be taken into account in computing the section 936 credit shall not be ineligible merely by reason of being received in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that income otherwise eligible to be taken into account in computing the Puerto Rico and possession tax credit shall not be ineligible merely by reason of being received in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that income otherwise eligible to be taken into account in computing the section 936 credit shall not be ineligible merely by reason of being received in the United States.
